sections.heading: subject to the Open Meetings Act or sections 84-712 to 84-712
sections.text: 09, mediation communications are confidential to the extent agreed by the parties or provided by other law or rule of this state.SourceLaws 2003, LB 255, ยง 8;Laws 2004, LB 821, ยง 9.Cross ReferencesOpen Meetings Act, see section 84-1407.
